backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six implemented features including hero section, Hindi welcome/closing messages, profile photo, showcase section, and warm Indian-inspired design theme.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend components describing the bilingual Lucky's World personal website with Hindi content and warm Indian design aesthetics.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette and light/dark theme support using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Lucky's World application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing the page layout with hero, welcome, showcase, closing sections and footer.
frontend/src/components/ClosingSection.t: Closing section component with Hindi message encouraging exploration, featuring gradient background and decorative star icon.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking, heart icon, and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with bilingual title 'Lucky's World / लकी की दुनिया' on gradient background with decorative SVG pattern and sparkles icon.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhoto.tsx: Profile photo component displaying Lucky's image with gradient glow effect, decorative border, and star badge overlay.
Showcase section with three bilingual cards (thoughts, experiences, interests) using icons and hover effects to display content categories.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeSection.t: Welcome section with two-column layout displaying profile photo and Hindi introduction text about Lucky's digital world.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, query caching, and automatic refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend integration; currently no backend queries are implemented as the site uses static content.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration defining a warm Indian-inspired color palette (marigold/saffron/cream), custom fonts (Poppins and Noto Sans Devanagari), and utility classes for warm colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom warm color palette (oklch color space), Indian-inspired design tokens, custom fonts, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Lucky's bilingual personal website with Hindi/English content, tracking implemented features (hero section, welcome messages, profile photo area) and pending feature requests.
